name: Dungeon King (itch)
description:
Play your way through 16 procedurally generated levels as the disgraced king of the realm, thrown into his most treacherous dungeon. Journey through the dangerous trap-filled depths in search of a way back to the surface so you can retake your throne.

Rip the multitude of enemies you had imprisoned to shreds and watch their blood splatter all over the floor. Battle 4 unique and challenging bosses.

Grab power ups generated from crushing your enemies’ souls, granting you powerful effects like Super Strength, Rapid Fire, or Hellfire.

Collect coins and spend them on powerful elixirs to improve your physical abilities.

Find mysterious statues that replenish your life or grant you runes which unlock blood magic spells.

Obtain a cute canine friend!
